name: VR! Guns Till Dawn!!
description:
Somewhere between this world and the next, a gunslinger is trapped in a ghostly town. Oily demons are trying to take him. He must send THEM to the next world.

Pickup Guns, teleport  through level, shoot lanterns to take out masses of oily demons. ..All inVR!  Works on Oculus Rift,

Made in just 4 days In Unreal Engine for UOC Game Jam 2021 as a Solo entry.

If you encounter bugs, pause is spacebar and exit game. it is a prototype.

Grab is palm buttons, shoot is triggers, teleport is buttons left n right to point teleport. Please Check out the video on

Thanks for PLAYING!
